title: Authors and Citation
text: Schulz M (2022). demopkg: package demo package creating R package. https://github.com/miriamschulz/demopkg, https://miriamschulz.github.io/demopkg/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {demopkg: This package is a demo package for creating an R package},   author = {Miriam Schulz},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/miriamschulz/demopkg, https://miriamschulz.github.io/demopkg/}, }

what: This package is a demo package for creating an R package
title: This package is a demo package for creating an R package
This package is a demo package for creating an R package
text: can install development version demopkg like :

what: APA Text for Paired Samples T-Test — apa_t_pair
title: APA Text for Paired Samples T-Test — apa_t_pair
text: Create APA-formatted text results paired-samples t-test following format: "paired-samples t-test conducted compare {dv} {level1} (M = {mean1}, SD = {sd1}) {level2} (M = {mean2}, SD = {sd2}). {non}significant difference; t({df}) = {t_value}, p = {p_value}."

title: APA Text for Paired Samples T-Test — apa_t_pair
code: apa_t_pair(   x,   y,   dv = "the DV",   level1 = "level 1",   level2 = "level 2",   alpha = 0.05 )

title: APA Text for Paired Samples T-Test — apa_t_pair
text: x (non-empty) numeric vector data values level 1. y (non-empty) numeric vector data values level 2. dv text describing DV output text. level1 text describing level 1 output text. level2 text describing level 2 output text. alpha critical alpha determining significance.

title: APA Text for Paired Samples T-Test — apa_t_pair
APA Text for Paired Samples T-Test — apa_t_pair
code: # use generic text apa_t_pair(x = self_res_att$f_self,            y = self_res_att$f_non) #> A paired-samples t-test was conducted to compare the DV between level 1 (M = 3.5, SD = 1.6) and level 2 (M = 3.0, SD = 1.2). There was a significant difference; t(107) = 3.60, p < 0.001.  # specify the text for dv and levels apa_t_pair(x = self_res_att$f_self,            y = self_res_att$f_non,            dv = "preferences for female faces",            level1 = "participants who resembled those faces",            level2 = "non-self participants") #> A paired-samples t-test was conducted to compare preferences for female faces between participants who resembled those faces (M = 3.5, SD = 1.6) and non-self participants (M = 3.0, SD = 1.2). There was a significant difference; t(107) = 3.60, p < 0.001.

Custom rounding function — round0
text: Rounds number returns string required number digits decimal point, including trailing zeroes, applicable.

title: Custom rounding function — round0
text: x numeric vector. digits Integer indicating number decimal places used.

title: Attractiveness of Self-Resembling Faces. — self_res_att
text: data frame 108 rows 16 variables: id participant unique ID sex sex participant (male/female) ethgroup ethnic group participant (east_asian/west_asian/white) age age participant years m_non mean number times group members chose male face attractive f_non mean number times group members chose female face attractive m_self number times possible 6 chose male self-res face attractive f_self number times possible 6 chose female self-res face attractive grpsize size group group unique group ID mascpref masculinity preference unrelated face preference task obro number older brothers osis number older sisters ybro number younger brothers ysis number younger sisters birthorder birth order (/firstborn/middleborn/lastborn) calculated number younger older brothers sisters

title: Averageness of Self-Resembling Faces. — self_res_avg
text: data frame 78 rows 9 variables: id participant unique ID sex sex participant (male/female) group unique group ID m_avg number times possible 6 chose male composite face attractive f_avg number times possible 6 chose female composite face attractive m_self number times possible 6 chose male self-res face attractive f_self number times possible 6 chose female self-res face attractive m_non mean number times group members chose male face attractive f_non mean number times group members chose female face attractive
